items.title: Scoop Kits
items.details: Personalize your Mustang and make it your own.
features: Hood Scoop, Quarter Panel Scoops and Side Quarter Window Scoops now available

Easy, no drill installation

items.title: Protection
items.imageCaption: Floor Mats - All-Weather Thermoplastic Rubber, Black, 4-Piece Set
items.details: The deep grooves and raised ridges in these heavy-duty mats catch and hold snow, slush and mud, while protecting the vehicle carpeting.
features: Nibbed backing and driver-side positive retention help keep mats in place.
Dual Retention on driver and passenger side.

items.title: Protection
items.details: Protect the flooring in your cargo area with this rugged, stain-resistant polyethylene tray specifically shaped to the contours of your vehicle. A raised lip helps contain spills.
features: Vehicle name molded into liner.
Black only.
Installs and removes easily without tools

items.title: Spoiler
items.details: Add a subtle, sporty look to your Mustang with this blade style spoiler designed specifically for your car.
features: Constructed of tough, lightweight, impact-resistant ABS plastic.
Comes primed and ready to paint. Dimensions – approximately 52" long, 8.3" wide, 2" high.
Includes mounting hardware, installation instructions and template.
Dealer installation recommended.

items.title: Spoiler
items.imageCaption: Spoiler - Rear Decklid, Blade Style, Coupe
items.details: This sharp spoiler adds a subtle edge of differentiation to the standout silhouette of your Mustang.
features: Constructed of a rigid, lightweight PC (polycarbonate) and ABS (acrylonitrile butadiene styrene) plastic blend Color – primed; ready to paint.
Dimensions – approximately 52" long, 8.5" wide, 1.6" high.
Includes mounting hardware, instructions and drill template (or utilizes existing factory decklid holes); 2-sided tape is for one-time use.
Dealer installation recommended.

items.title: Spoiler
items.imageCaption: Spoiler - Shelby GT350 Track Pack, Absolute Black
items.details: Not only is this raised spoiler stunning, it's an authentic piece of one of the most iconic, adrenaline-pumping Mustang nameplates of all time. Even upon it's debut in 1965, the legendary GT350 spit out more than 300 horses through its cobra V8 muscle. Now's the time to make your sporting street machine a touch meaner.
features: Finished in Absolute Black Clearacoat
Includes spoiler, plus mounting hardware and drill template (or utilizes existing factory decklid holes).
Dealer Installation recommended.

items.title: Spoiler
items.details: This race-inspired rear wing from ROUSH is notched out for maximum rear visibility .
features: Race-inspired.
Made from lightweight ABS (acrylonitrile butadiene styrene) for superior appearance, durability, and heat and impact resistance.
Designed with OEM CAD data to ensure precise fitment.
Available unpainted.
Templates, hardware, high-quality adhesive tape included

items.title: Supercharger
features: Fits 2015-2016 Mustang GT 5.0L V8
Not applicable to vehicles with adaptive cruise control.
Compatible with both manual and automatic transmissions.

items.title: Supercharger

Not applicable to vehicles with adaptive cruise control.

items.title: Exhaust Kit
features: All new for 2015-2017 V8 Mustangs
ROUSH designed Single tip high-flow mufflers
Corrosion resistant 304 stainless steel
Full mandrel bending
4" Flash-chromed dual wall tips
Uses OEM hangers and mounting points
No welding required
Some cutting required

items.title: Exhaust Kit
features: No Calibration required (85mm MAF insert)
Will not void warranty (85mm MAF insert)
Improved throttle response
Features ROUSH Logo
Increased performance by 10.4 HP and 8.54 ft-lbs torque (85mm MAF insert)
Less intake restriction than stock intake
Easy installation (no drilling or cutting required)
Reusable Oil-free air filter
Superior filtration properties

items.title: Exhaust Kit
features: Dual Tip Mufflers
Compatible with ROUSH Active exhaust Module (Part# 421926)
4" Chrome flashed tips
Corrosion resistant 304 stainless steel
Requires ROUSH rear valance 421894 (w/o back up sensors) or
421919 (with back up sensors).

items.title: Exhaust Kit
items.imageCaption: Rear Valance Kit - with Back-up Sensor
features: Pre-prepped for Back-up sensor installation.
Specifically designed for ROUSH Quad Tip Exhausts
Made from high-strength TPO (thermal plastic olefin) for long lasting durability
Shaped with high-pressure injection molding, the same process that the OEMs use.
Designed around original manufacturer CAD data for optimum quality and fit.
Comes unpainted with grain texture 90.
Day ROUSH Limited Parts Warranty.
Made in the U.S.A.
Fits Mustangs with Premium Chassis Packages only
